com.droid.gamedev

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.droid.gamedev.Game
      • com.droid.gamedev.GameEngine

  • public abstract class GameEngine
extends Game
    Extending Game class functionality to be able to handle multiple game screen in order to separate game logic into separated entities. For example: manage intro screen, title screen, menu screen, and main game screen as separated entity.
    Author:
    Steph

    • Constructor Summary

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Refresh game global variables, called right before playing next game object. The implementation of this method provided by the GameEngine class does nothing.
